Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.
Download Go
Binary distributions available for
Linux, macOS, Windows, and more.
Try Go
Open in Playground

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
  fmt.Println("Hello, 世界")
}
